moves.1. d4 d5 2. e3 Nc6 3. Nf3 Nf6 4. c4 dxc4: Winning a lot lately with the defense.
moves.5... Ne4 6. Nc3: Happy to trade off knights to get him out the centre and also give extra protection to y d pawn
moves.6... Be6: Not accepted, now he will lose both bishop and knight for my bishop.
moves.7. Bxe6 fxe6: Also doubling up pawns in front of the king
moves.8. Nxe4 e5 9. Qa4: Trapping his knight so I can take the e5 pawn with my knight
moves.14... Kf7 15. Qd5+: Thought he would put queen in the way which to my delight he does
